meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fond of eating and drinking.
meanings.sent1: The gormand at the party devoured all the snacks within minutes.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a true gormand, always trying out new restaurants and dishes.
meanings.sent3: The gormand's love for food was so great, they even dreamt of eating giant marshmallows.
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was like a gormand's, insatiable and always craving more.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gormand with a mountain of food in front of them was unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The hungry child gormanded the cookies as soon as they came out of the oven.
meanings.sent2: After the long hike, we all gormanded on the delicious barbecue feast.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon gormanded on the leftovers from the picnic, leaving nothing behind.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as he gormanded the last piece of cake, savoring every bite.
meanings.sent5: The wolves gormanding on their prey in the moonlight was a chilling sight.
